qas.question: What country has produced a large number of preachers?
What Dominican Friar inugurated the conferences of Notre Dame of Paris?
What is the name of another French Dominican friar during this time?
What is one of the leading international centers for biblical research?

answers.text: the École Biblique et Archéologique française de Jérusalem

qas.question: What was prepared at the Ecole Biblique?
What country has produced a large number of nuns?
What Benedictine Friar inaugurated the conference of Notre Dame of Paris?
What is the name of another English Benedictine friar during this time?

plausible_answers.text: the École Biblique et Archéologique française de Jérusalem

qas.question: What did English Dominican found and administer?
What was not prepared at the Ecole Biblique?

context: The province of <a0_0><b5_0>France<b5_0/><a0_0/> has produced a large number of preachers. The conferences of Notre-Dame-de-Paris were inaugurated by <a1_0><b6_0>Père Lacordaire<b6_0/><a1_0/>. The Dominicans of the province of France furnished Lacordaire (1835–1836, 1843–1851), Jacques Monsabré (1869–1870, 1872–1890), Joseph Ollivier (1871, 1897), <a2_0><b7_0>Thomas Etourneau<b7_0/><a2_0/> (1898–1902).[citation needed] Since 1903 the pulpit of Notre Dame has been occupied by a succession of Dominicans. Père Henri Didon (d. 1900) was a Dominican. The house of studies of the province of France publishes L'Année Dominicaine (founded 1859), La Revue des Sciences Philosophiques et Theologiques (1907), and La Revue de la Jeunesse (1909). French Dominicans founded and administer <a3_0><b8_0>the École Biblique et Archéologique française de Jérusalem<b8_0/><a3_0/> founded in 1890 by Père Marie-Joseph Lagrange O.P. (1855–1938), one of the leading international centres for Biblical research. It is at the École Biblique that the famed <a4_0><b9_0>Jerusalem Bible<b9_0/><a4_0/> (both editions) was prepared.
